treatment-md.title: Tanzawana flavomaculata Watanabe, Taniwaki & Kasparyan, 2015, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Tanzawana flavomaculata (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ctenopelmatinae), a new genus and species of parasitoid of Fagineura crenativora (Tenthredinidae, Nematinae), a serious pest of beech tree
